issue.title: Implement Decimal using only Int128
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1449](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1449). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is for compatibility with the java implementation which uses only 16 byte arrays to represent Decimal values.
